name: The Spirit's Eyes
description:
A young boy gets lost in a large forest after arguing with his friend...
Help him leave the forest and discover its secrets in this 3D sokoban-like with lots of twists!

Switch between two characters and use the vision cone feature to manipulate which cube blocks the way and which does not.

Game Design & Programming:

Samuel Hoarau: https://gamejolt.com/@wellios
Ethan Chatelard: https://eltymme.itch.io
Anita Nguan: https://nekuya.itch.io
Gabriel Bernabeu: https://gabriel-bernabeu.itch.io
Thomas Debailleux: https://okapeaks.itch.io/
